about-us.title: About Herbalicious: Our Mission for Purity
about-us.content:
Our Story

Born in the heart of Lahore, Herbalicious was founded on a simple realization: Nature is the ultimate chemist. We spent years researching traditional subcontinental beauty rituals to understand why our ancestors had such resilient skin and hair.

The Artisan Process (Small Batch vs. Mass Produced)

Unlike global conglomerates that produce millions of identical products using synthetic fillers, Herbalicious follows a 'Small Batch' philosophy. Every bar of soap is hand-cut and cured for 6 weeks. Every bottle of serum is mixed using cold-pressed oils to preserve the delicate bio-actives of the plants.

Founder's Commitment

'If I wouldn't use it on my own family, I won't sell it to yours.' - This is the standard we live by. We are transparent about every single ingredient we use, ensuring your home remains a sanctuary from toxic chemicals.

Why Choose Herbalicious?

  • 100% Non-Toxic: No Parabens, Sulfates, or Phthalates.
  • Handmade in Lahore: Supporting local agriculture and artisan skills.
  • E-E-A-T Certified: Our formulations are guided by herbalists and tested for safety and potency.

shipping-policy.title: Shipping Policy
shipping-policy.content:
Shipping Details

Herbalicious Shop offers Free Shipping on Orders Over Rs 5,000.

General Shipping Terms

  • Delivery Address: We ship your order to the address you provide during checkout.
  • Shipping Costs: For orders below Rs 5,000, shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your order total and delivery location.
  • Delays: We are not responsible for delays in shipping caused by factors beyond our control, such as weather or customs delays.
  • Responsibility: Ensure your contact information and address are correct to avoid delivery failures.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content:
Privacy Policy

Herbalicious Shop respects the privacy of our users. This policy describes how we collect and use your information.

Information We Collect

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, shipping address, and billing address when you place an order or create an account.
  • Non-Personal Information: Browsing history, IP address, and device type collected automatically to improve your experience.

How We Use Your Information

  • To process orders and fulfill requests.
  • To send order confirmations and shipping updates.
  • To send promotional emails (if opted-in).
  • To improve our Website and marketing efforts.

Data Security

We take reasonable steps to protect your information from loss or unauthorized access, though no internet transmission is 100% secure. You may opt out of promotional emails at any time.
